page.title: 03Education, Murroes
page.content: AT PRIMARY LEVEL LOCAL AUTHORITY EDUCATION IS PROVIDED AT{MATTOCKS } {SCHOOL, WELLBANK, AND MURROES } {SCHOOL, DUNTRUNE.}NORMALLY PUPILS PROCEED FOR SECONDARY EDUCATION TO MONIFIETH HIGH SCHOOL. THERE IS ALSO PROVISION FOR PRE-SCHOOL EDUCATION AT MURROES SCHOOL NURSERY CLASS, WHICH HAS ACCOMMODATION FOR 10 CHILDREN, MOST OF WHOM COME FROM THE MURROES, MATTOCKS AND TEALING AREA. THE NEEDS OF STUDENTS WHO WISH TO PROCEED TO TERTIARY EDUCATION IN THE AREA ARE CATERED FOR AT DUNDEE UNIVERSITY, COLLEGE OF COMMERCE, KINGSWAY TECHNICAL COLLEGE, AND THE COLLEGE OF EDUCATION.
